Articles.Content: Hello! I'm sure this question has been asked many times before. During downtime, I tried finding the answer, but since the forums were down I could not see the answer, and now the revert has them gone. Sometimes I'll click to download something in the spaceport but it will not download. It just keeps loading.
Has this been going on for some time, or is it a recent problem? Spaceport got bogged down/reset as well.
